usereventscript.description: "this UE script, deployed on [AKT Integr RMA tо IR], firing on [beforeSubmit], does the following: - captures the respective return authorization, before the custom record has been created, along with the return items booked - tries to create an item receipt with JSON information about the items - because of many limiations, the items returned will be either stand-alone items (in case of replacement) or kit items with up to 2 components (in case of refund) - if the script fails, the whole creation of the record fails, which signals back to Celigo and raises an error message - once the item receipt is created, it's stamped into the respective field on the custom record type"
usereventscript.name: AKT Integr RMA tо IR
